org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: Government of the Province of Saskatchewan

I hereby Certify that WILLIAM FABYAN WINDEATT of REGINA in the Province of Saskatchewan was on the SEVENTEENTH day of DECEMBER, 1917 duly appointed a NOTARY PUBLIC in and for the said Province, that the commission of the said WILLIAM FABYAN WINDEATT in that behalf has never been revoked and that he is at this date a NOTARY PUBLIC as aforesaid, and as such is a person before whom proof may be made of the execution of deeds and other instruments by the law of the said Province.
Given under my hand at Regina, in the said Province, this TWELFTH day of August, 1921
I, John William McLeod, of the City of Regina in the Province of Saskatchewan, Clerk of the Executive Council of the Province of Saskatchewan.

1. That I am now and have been since March 1st A.D. 1910, Clerk of the Executive Council for the Province of Saskatchewan, and as such am by law entrusted with the custody of the records of the appointment of the Acting Deputy Attorney General in the said Province.

2. THAT the appointment of the Acting Deputy Attorney General was made by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council and that the record of such appointment is kept by me in my office and is under my custody and control.

3. THAT annexed hereto and marked Exhibit "A" to this Declaration is a certified copy of the order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council appointing Malcolm Dingwall as Acting Deputy Attorney General in and for the Province of Saskatchewan.

4. THAT annexed hereto and marked Exhibit "B" to this Declaration is a copy of The Saskatchewan Gazette of November 30th, A.D. 1918, containing notice of the appointment of the said Malcolm Dingwall as Acting Deputy Attorney General, aforesaid.
AND I MAKE this solemn declaration conscientiously believing it to be true and knowing that it is of the same force and effect as if made under oath and by virtue of "THE CANADA EVIDENCE ACT".
DECLARED before me at the City of Regina in the Province of Saskatchewan, Canada, this twelfth day of August, A.D. 1921.
A Notary Public in and for the Province of Saskatchewan.
